banner.title: OFFER AND REQUEST
banner.subtitle: Services that matters to you
banner.description: Find out what's possible with Konecta! Connect with creators, educators, artists, therapists, lawyers, lecturers and much more.

preRegistration.title: DO MISSIONS. EARN TIME. TAKE CONTROL.
preRegistration.subtitle: Pre-Registration
preRegistration.description: Get early access to Konecta and be the first to test, earn, and co-own.

about.title: IN YOUR CONTROL, SECURED BY THE COMMUNITY
about.subtitle: Personal, decentralized, and intuitive
about.description: The features of KonectA focus on allowing users to easily find and connect with content creators and their desired content, providing a personalized experience that is tailored to their interests and preferences.

cards.title: Personal calendar
cards.description: Imagine using your personal calendar in multiple applications without any hazzle.

cards.title: Content filter
cards.description: Customize the menu by applying filters based on language, course specialty, event time and day, and number of attendees.

cards.title: Content search
cards.description: Search for specific content like on YouTube and schedule live events with creators in your selected interests.

prefooter.title: Getting started
prefooter.subtitle: Start your Konecta journey
prefooter.description: Learn everything you need to know, from beginner to master.

team.title: Meet the team
team.subtitle: We are a team of passionate individuals who are dedicated to creating a platform that empowers users to connect with content creators and their desired content.
